Posts.Content: How strange,I was taken off of Taxil because of side effects, and just had carbo.As soon as I was taken off of tax my hair started to grow ( albeit slowly ) I was told that it's the Taxil that stops your hair growing. I have been using Argan oil, and I think it has made a difference,I massage it in my scalp night and morning.Just goes to show how different every one isÂ
Posts.Title: Want hair back
